caption.p: Fig. S2. Annual maximum UML depth based on the monthly mean values (m). Global model results for the decade 2000–2009 (a), climatology (b); Subplots c‐l show magnified view of panel a (left column) and panel b (right column) for five regional hotspots considered in this paper and shown as black rectangles on panels a and b: Brazilian (c, d) South African (e, f), Mozmbique Channel (g, h), Indian (i, j) and East Australian (k, l).
